text: {| |} The Sin Hung-class patrol boat is a class of patrol boats in service with the Korean People's Navy. The class is based on the same hull as the , and . ==Construction== Construction of the Sin Hung class was first noticed in early 1984, when six Sin Hung hulls were seen being built without torpedo tubes or sponsons. A total of eight were seen to be built, all at the Nampo Shipyard. Two of these were sold to Nicaragua in late May of the same year. ==References== Category:Patrol boats of North Korea Category:Patrol boat classes
title: Sin Hung-class patrol boat
